description:
Fans of the music group Sleep Token are in for a treat. The British heavy metal band, first formed in 2016, has officially announced their next album. Additionally, they’ve already unveiled a new single that fans can already stream in anticipation of their upcoming release. The new single, titled “Emergence,” is a sneak-peek at the [...]

title: Sleep Token Announce New Album, US Tour & Release Single “Emergence”

description:
The production of Disney’s live-action Snow White film has been followed by controversy since its inception. Now, due to controversies regarding stars Rachel Zegler and Gal Gadot, it looks like Disney is dialing back its Hollywood premiere for Snow White. With a production that can be traced back to 2016, it’s been nearly a decade [...]

title: Disney Dials Back ‘Snow White’ Premiere Over Cast Controversies

description:
It’s become a disappointing endeavor whenever a beloved series is canceled. This is now the case with another beloved series on CBS, but what’s surprising this time around, is that it’s the third time this series has been canceled by the network.
